description: Extracts information regarding the bed charge billing history for a patient's encounter.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique, internal contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: BED_CHARGE_DATE
columns.description: The dates that bed charges have been generated for this patient.

columns.name: HTR
columns.description: Link to the transaction that represents the bed charge on the hospital account record (HAR).

columns.name: BED_CHARGE_BCC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the cost center record associated with the bed charge.

columns.name: BED_CHARGE_BCC_ID_COST_CENTER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the cost center.

columns.name: BED_CHARGE_UNIT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the department record where the bed charge was triggered.

columns.name: BED_CHARGE_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the bed charge procedure record.

columns.name: BED_CHARGE_DTTM
columns.description: Contains the instant for which the bed charge was dropped.

columns.name: BED_CHARGE_ROOM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the room where the patient is charged for.

columns.name: BED_CHARGE_BED_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the bed where the patient is charged for.

columns.name: BED_CHARGE_ACCOMMODATION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The accommodation code category ID the patient is charged for.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
